projects.title: Guessing Game
projects.description: Guess the number I guess the number game with a fun victory message. The object of the game is to try to guess a number between 0 and 100. The program will tell you if the number is higher or lower than the number you previously guessed.</br>This project is written entirely in react, and uses local storage to persist the high score.

projects.title: Mike Misiura
projects.description: A personal website designed by and about Mike Misiura to show the world my skills and the quality of my work.</br>This is a front end only project built using react, next, and javascript.

projects.title: Tweeter
projects.description:
A social media website that allows users to log and post messages that everyone else who visits the website can read.
The back end of this project is written in typescript, the front end is written in react, and it accesses a my sequel database.

projects.title: Sales
projects.description:
This is a sample front end or an admin to a sales site. To you sir is able to create, edit, and delete products to be sold on an e-commerce site.
This project is written in react, javascript, and bootstrap.

projects.title: Resume Webpage
projects.description:
The homepage (only) of a website advertising my skills.
This page is coded entirely from HTML, CSS, and javascript. I did not use any frameworks.

projects.title: Stack Jam
projects.description:
An e-commerce website that advertises and sells multiple products. Users can log in to persist their cart or write reviews. Users can also contact the owner through a message form.
This site is integrated with Intuit to allow easy inventory and sales features.
This site is written in react front end, a typescript, node.js backend
